setup_sql: CREATE TABLE tasking_lock(lockid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, locked INTEGER, current_taskid INTEGER, desc TEXT, update_time TEXT)
CREATE TABLE tasks(taskid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, lockid INTEGER, desc TEXT)
CREATE TABLE task_doing(taskid INTEGER, subtask_list TEXT, step TEXT, update_time TEXT)
CREATE TABLE task_appending(taskid INTEGER, subtask_list TEXT, locked INTEGER, update_time TEXT)
